scheduler

Class WeightedScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • scheduler.ProcessScheduler
      • scheduler.WeightedScheduler

  • public class WeightedScheduler
extends ProcessScheduler
    WeightedScheduler class implements a weighted scheduler where any process is run by a given weight.
    Author:
    razvan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int[] crtWeights
      an array of current weights.

    • Field Detail

      • crtWeights

        private int[] crtWeights
        an array of current weights. It is used to store current weights, and when all weights are 0, the array will be reinitialized to maximum weights.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WeightedScheduler

        public WeightedScheduler(int numProcesses,
                         java.lang.String cacheType,
                         int cacheSize)
        Create a new instance of weighted scheduler. Also initialize all current weights to 0.
        Parameters:
        numProcesses - the number of processes
        cacheType - the type of cache
        cacheSize - the size of cache

    • Method Detail

      • generatePID

        protected int generatePID()
        Description copied from class: ProcessScheduler
        Generate a PID according to some scheduler policy. This method must be implemented in order to run the scheduler.
        Specified by:
        generatePID in class ProcessScheduler
        Returns:
        a PID generated.

      • initAllWeights

        private void initAllWeights(Process[] processes)
        Initialize all weights to maximum values and reduce them by their greatest common divisor.
        Parameters:
        processes - an array of all processes

      • gcdNumbers

        private int gcdNumbers(int a,
                       int b)
        Computes the greatest common divisor between two numbers.
        Parameters:
        a - first number
        b - second number
        Returns:
        the greatest common divisor between a and b

      • gcdWeights

        private int gcdWeights(Process[] processes)
        Find the gcd of all weights
        Parameters:
        processes - all processes
        Returns:
        the gcd

      • getAvailablesPIDs

        private int[] getAvailablesPIDs(int numProcesses)
        Go though all current weights and store the PID where the weight is not 0. When the array has been finished, fill remaining space by -1.
        Parameters:
        numProcesses - the number of processes
        Returns:
        an array all PIDs where weights is not 0

      • chooseRndPID

        private int chooseRndPID(int[] availablePIDs)
        This method computes a randomly weighted value between the PIDs where weights are different form 0. Firstly count the number of available PIDs, then choose a random PID in that range.
        Parameters:
        availablePIDs - an array of available PIDs. It the array is not full, the empty values will be set to -1 by the user.
        Returns:
        a randomly weighted PID.

      • allWeightsAreZero

        private boolean allWeightsAreZero()
        Checks is all weights are set to 0.
        Returns:
        true if all weights are 0, otherwise false
